scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon app.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --watch --verbose && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run clean-up
scripts.test:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging jest --all --runInBand --forceExit && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node test-cleanup
